item.description: Britneyspearsmedia uploaded this, but I checked it out and it's just an ACC stereo mix.
item.author: bananenmann

item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Tiara Andini - Ngeluwihi (single) & Discography Flac
item.description:
Hi,
I'm looking for a good quality Verson of Evanescence's "Good Enough" as a clean VOB or Mpeg2-File - I mean a Pal or NTSC Video File without a Logo. (So no Promo Video). A good upscale would also be fine. I need it, because I want to make an 4K AI Upscale from it and therefore I need the best Video source possible.




This is my actual 1080p Upscale, unfortunately with a LOGO


---------------------------------------------

I've already found a 720p Video, but it's quality does not meet my requirements. It has a rarely used framerate of 30 FPS and Playback is stuttering. I think the creator did something wrong when he scaled it up. Here is the media info of that file, which I dont need. If you have that video, you don't need to upload it, because I already have it. Click to open the Spoiler:

Format : MPEG-4
Format-Profil : Base Media
Codec-ID : isom (isom/iso2/avc1/mp41)
Dateigröße : 99,9 MiB
Dauer : 4 min 40s
Gesamte Bitrate : 2 985 kb/s
Bildwiederholungsrate : 30,000 FPS
Kodierendes Programm : Lavf58.29.100

Video
ID : 1
Format : AVC
Format/Info : Advanced Video Codec
Format-Profil : High@L3.1
Format-Einstellungen : CABAC / 4 Ref Frames
Format-Einstellungen für CABAC : Ja
Format-Einstellungen für RefFrames : 4 frames
Format settings, GOP : M=1, N=31
Codec-ID : avc1
Codec-ID/Info : Advanced Video Coding
Dauer : 4 min 40s
Bitrate : 2 772 kb/s
Breite : 1 280 Pixel
Höhe : 720 Pixel
Bildseitenverhältnis : 16:9
Modus der Bildwiederholungsrate : variabel
Bildwiederholungsrate : 30,000 FPS

Chroma subsampling : 4:2:0
Bit depth : 8 bits
Scantyp : progressiv
Bits/(Pixel*Frame) : 0.100
Stream-Größe : 92,7 MiB (93%)
Tagging-Datum : 2020-07-09 20:28:14 UTC
Codec configuration box : avcC

Audio
ID : 2
Format : AAC LC
Format/Info : Advanced Audio Codec Low Complexity
Codec-ID : mp4a-40-2
Dauer : 4 min 40s
Bitraten-Modus : konstant
Bitrate : 210 kb/s
Kanäle : 2 Kanäle
Channel layout : L R
Samplingrate : 44,1 kHz
Bildwiederholungsrate : 43,066 FPS (1024 SPF)
Compression mode : Lossy
Stream-Größe : 7,02 MiB (7%)

Tagging-Datum : 2020-07-09 20:28:14 UTC

That's it !!!

Thanx in advance to all of you and have a nice weekend !!!
